UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Development of Amphipathic Antimicrobial Peptide Foldamers Based on Magainin 2 Sequence
Literature.Author: Goto C, Hirano M, Hayashi K, Kikuchi Y, Hara-Kudo Y, Misawa T, Demizu Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NBRC 13276(MIC=50µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis NBRC 12298(MIC=12.5µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=3.125µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NBRC 13275(MIC=3.125µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(no activity data)
